Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence, offering unparalleled benefits and capabilities. Given its unique features and the value it brings, we believe it is worth more than $1000000 to us. Considering the immense value this product holds, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. We understand that the true worth of this product might be subjective, but we are confident that it will meet and surpass your expectations. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction with exceptional customer service and support throughout your journey with our product. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
